mapper.select: SELECT productId, productImageUrl, productDescription, productContent, display_info.id AS displayInfoId, place_name AS placeName FROM (SELECT id AS productId, file_name AS productImageUrl, description AS productDescription, content AS productContent FROM product LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id, file_name FROM product_image LEFT JOIN file_info ON product_image.file_id = file_info.id WHERE product_image.type = 'th') AS product_image_with_type_th ON product.id = product_image_with_type_th.product_id) AS product LEFT JOIN display_info ON product.productId = display_info.product_id LIMIT #{start}, #{limit};
